documents.document: RT @fentonjames16: Here it is, folks. The most Irish weather forecast of all time. https://t.co/zJXkjQtHZB
@YellowBellyBeer @TaleOfAle Ah thanks! It's the Drinkstore, but sure they can't keep the stuff on the shelves 😉
@TaleOfAle Yes, there's a point, and I'm massively thankful for the improvement in variety between my two pregnancies. I can't get my hands on a can of DD, but would love to try it.
@CormacODwyer What a hardship 😅
Now, to hunt down some strawberry Angel Delight... https://t.co/ZnVzvEbLqb

@sineadcuddihy Spoiler alert: bought some. The ads don't go away. 😱
(They are great slippers, though)
Nope, didn't dream it. Roll on May. https://t.co/6xjqdY8LUB
@EmerTheScreamer Last day of the Arnotts sale today! Electronics and ting in the basement.
@blatherina Oh, I love her. Bookmarked 👍
@urchinette A resounding recommendation if there ever was one! Feel better soon.
@urchinette Oh, I'm in dire need of a good desk disco this afternoon. To my headphones!
@BiddyEarly Doubly frustrating as I watch all you cyclists zoom by 😊
@BiddyEarly And I'm on one of about another fifteen jammed onto D'Olier Street. 😣
@EidinNiShe @urchinette @ccrichton The pool seems to be a total afterthought in this case. :(
@EidinNiShe @ccrichton @urchinette And the soupy gravy.
@urchinette Artisanal 99s and coddle pizza but no heating and no public access. Priorities all over the gaff!
@SarahJayBee OMG sold
@sweetoblivion26 @kumailn The ceremony is also two days before my due date, I mean there are worse ways to go into labour...

Between Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan's nominations (YES!), @kumailn's The Big Sick getting a nod, and the prospect of Sufjan Stevens performing, I'm going to bet this is the most I'll ever cry at an Oscars ceremony. #oscars2018
@sambhana And Trolls. The Algorithm must be so confused.
@sambhana See also: sharing an account with a 4.5 year old 🤦
@blatherina Andy's voice is so soothing though 😍
@urchinette @SarahJayBee Ha, me either! I lived on Rathlin Road in college. Could totally picture him in one of the houses on the Rise (with added bonus of staying close to Andersons)
@Tales_of_cake Bon voyage and please have some Tartine goodies on my behalf when you land 😊
@CiaraACrybaby Thank you! 😊
Best of luck to the #together4yes crew for this morning's launch - I'm applauding as loudly as I can with a sleeping 3 week old beside me. #repealthe8th https://t.co/v7S0VALKxk
@GrangegormanDev Thanks so much! Hoping to make it down tomorrow.
@raptureponies @darraghdoyle @anthonymcg That was @Leo_Byrne's doing - blast from the past!
@GrangegormanDev Hello! Will details & drawings be posted online at any stage?
@srpski_dubliner Pro tip: stock up on white sliced bread 👌
@CiaraACrybaby You're welcome 😊
@CiaraACrybaby WM Trimmings on Capel Street should sort you! They're super sound.
Paging Aislings everywhere @SarahJayBee @EmerTheScreamer https://t.co/HZVoGDZGKw
@orlamcdermott Yikes. Place finished up well though...
@orlamcdermott Only just getting to it now myself. AAAAIIIEEEEEEEEEE
@SarahJayBee You're also gonna need a #dogs channel and a #cats channel FYI

Still thinking about all the incredible humans @RotundaHospital who helped us welcome our little girl Hazel into the world early on Friday morning. We got home yesterday; I'm hoping they're enjoying some well earned downtime by now too. What a week.
@dublinbarista Totally did this at 4am, your next book's gonna have to be a parenting manual.
@SarahJayBee Hanging in there!
@SarahJayBee Next stop: Entylawyer Blind Item
@TomFoxy 🙃😂
@agarbes In the second-time-round-any-day-now camp here too, and didn't know how much I needed to read this until I read this. Thank you and good luck🙏
@geoffreykeating Whoa, amazing 😍 Content + @intercombrandtm + @rich_archbold = dream team 👏
@SarahJayBee @ElementPictures @emerthescreamer Yis are only massive - congrats! 👏👏👏
Snow flurries in D7 already. Time to batten down the hatches and channel this little guy. #BeastFromTheEast https://t.co/LI2YqWgoMr
@wherewishes @jillajordan Ah we'll get there! Also I just copped why your book looked so familiar - Toy Show! Unreal! Ar an liosta 😊

@wherewishes @jillajordan @futafata @MyraZepf @BIGPictureBooks We've inherited a few of the Walker series here! Animal stories a big hit so I think Futa Fata will be our next port of call. I may keep the obair bhaile up myself 😊
@jillajordan @wherewishes @futafata GRMA!
This episode is going to have me in the labour ward yet... #RoomToImprove
@SarahJayBee You couldn't make it up like.
@SarahJayBee Can't look away though
I, too, have chosen to settle down with a former housemate. WHERE are my two mansions and my 600k renovation budget?! #RoomToImprove
@jymian 👌
@orlamcdermott @BIGPictureBooks Oh there must be a few more so! We have Ar Strae Beagán as well now (the original was a big hit here.)
@BebhinnMeadhbh @duolingo Ciúnas bóthar cailín bainne...? 😅
@BebhinnMeadhbh @duolingo GRMA! 😊
@antgalvin Ah that's brilliant, the daily practice will help loads!
@antgalvin @duolingo It does start at the deep end to be fair!
(Related: if anyone can recommend other decent Irish language reads for a curious almost-five-year old and her very rusty parents, hit me up!)
Having spent the last couple of months mucking about with Irish on @duolingo, I'm about to tackle my biggest challenge yet... https://t.co/r8LJSgiUI6
(It still amazes me that my daughter's library card allows her to borrow twelve books at a time. TWELVE!)

Love this from @LucyMangan on the joy of childhood reading. I'll always be thankful for our kindly local librarian, who set up extra library cards for my sisters and I, using our middle names, so we could borrow four books at a time instead of two. https://t.co/FIIb5vVAdD
@jaycee001 @stewartsc Is this the part where we find out you're both secret Shed Seven fans?
@daveegan @tweetaoif Apparently if you reply to the text it posts to my profile! Go home, FB, yer drunk.
@tweetaoif @daveegan It's grand I sent it to him via carrier pigeon as well 😅
@StanMassueras 👏👏👏👏👏

Two years @intercom! They've been the happiest, most fulfilling of my working life, and I'm chuffed with this Intercomic from the amazing humans I work with. Maternity leave means not seeing them for a while, but I'm excited for the adventures ahead of us all this year 😊 https://t.co/aPx22DuDgQ
@HannahPopham Can't possibly compete with that, but happy birthday anyway 💃🎉
@orlamcdermott @susanbrodigan OMG PLEASE get a Dermo selfie by the fire pit?!
@SarahJayBee Heck no. Google Docs all the way. (Although I'm usually writing process docs and product guides vs An Actual Future Bestseller)
@Ormakapay Asc**gh home turf 😔 hope the hike was good though.
@fiftythreesix Yas! Congrats! 🙌
@sweetoblivion26 oh so that's what's going on next door! *waves*
New life goal: achieve the Zen levels of Sostrene Grene's copywriting team. https://t.co/4BMDuAEK37
RT @Together4yes: We did it!!! Half a million euro for our caring and compassionate Yes message! Thank you so much to the more than 13,000…

@RoryEnglish @GinandGriddle @Together4yes @DubSCRepeal Posters are only one element of the campaign and it'll look very different this time next week thanks to 13,000 brilliant humans who've put their money where their mouth is in the last 3 days 💪
@RoryEnglish @GinandGriddle Would definitely recommend you follow @Together4yes and @DubSCRepeal for an informed view of everything that's going on. We've still got a long road ahead of us.

@RoryEnglish @GinandGriddle Posters help - and there will be another 15,000 now after this week's crowdfund - but the conversations on the ground are what'll win or lose this and plenty of ground is being covered there.

@RoryEnglish Not being funny but have you been under a rock all week? A group of 60 people canvassed in Ranelagh 2 nights ago and the campaign has raised 500k in 3 days. There is trojan work going on.
@urchinette Delighted to hear it - well done you!
@aoiph The video was properly dreamy. Beat Box memories!
@aoiph Shepherd Moons was the first album I bought with my own money (on TAPE). Total classic, no regrets.

@urchinette Good on you - wish I was able to do the same! I'd never canvassed before the marriage equality referendum and it was a great experience. You'll have so many sound folks out there with you too.
@SarahJayBee Alllllll the caffeine. Much needed 💀

@SarahJayBee Oh, it's truly awful. And the muzak sets my teeth on edge. But they've got comfy chairs for feeding in and the staff are nice to my kid and it's literally 2 minutes from my door so ¯\_(ツ)_/ ¯
@SarahJayBee My second home! So bland but so comforting. Maternity leave is turning me into a basic Bridget.
@SarahJayBee Oh hi are you in this M&S café too? 😢😢😢
@neasaconneally I suspect you're right. Bionic Bezza?
@neasaconneally The moving tent! Mary's glasses! It's so weird to look back on.
@stewartsc @ismellpaper @thecarpenter__ It's beaaaaaaauuuuuuutiful 😍
Here's a super fun run through the evolution of messaging from my @intercom fam. We've come a long way since the days of ICQ and cryptic away messages👵 https://t.co/Qmv1IBMQs2
@K8 @LinkedIn No better woman! Congrats! 🎉
RT @suzybie: 250k in 12hrs 10mins - @Together4yes and all who sail in her - take a bow. 👏 https://t.co/iX14FAeLIy
@lornab79 @__MissMeg__ Update: I chickened out 🙈 The crowdfunder has already delivered two therapeutic weeps today!
@__MissMeg__ I'm afraid I might cry! (I'm very tired)

There are two 60something women talking about Savita and respect for individual choices at the table next to me in this café and it is killing me not to go over and high five them both. #TogetherForYes
@Ormakapay "Lack of urgency" my HOOP. 💪
Alllllll the posters 👏 https://t.co/ZfaQvVb9hX
@MarianKeyes You're a legend - bualadh bos ❤ https://t.co/voytf6MdcR
